name: Toy Block: Tap Cube Brick Pop
name_original: Toy Block: Tap Cube Brick Pop
description:
Toy block is a simple and challenging square game.
Match the same color cubes and destroy the box to qualify.
There is no time limit. You are only limited by the number of moves.
Go ahead and hit these cartoon cubes!

All you need to do is take the matching cubes and let the new cube fall off the top.
Match 2 or more adjacent cubes to complete missions, reach high scores, and clear target

It's very easy to get started. The gameplay is very straightforward.

Feature：
- colorful screens, great sound effects, challenging and fun games
- 200 levels, complete all levels, reach the peak of the game (until now!)
- stunning graphics and beautiful visuals
- Powerful props
- when you reach a certain level, you will receive a surprise box


Try it, this game is really interesting!
